import './charList.scss'; import abyss from '../../resources/img/abyss.jpg'; import { Component } from 'react'; import MarvelService from '../../services/MarvelService'; class CharList extends Component { state = { } marvelService = MarvelService(); updateCharList = () => { const id = Math.floor(Math.random() * (1011400 - 1011000) + 1011000); this.marvelService .getAllCharacters(id) .then(this.onCharLoaded) .catch(this.onError) } render() { return (
